summary: User request to publish a Postman collection with gRPC APIs documented for easier API exploration and testing. Postman recently added support for gRPC requests, making this feature now feasible.
userImpact: Users would have easier access to gRPC API specifications and examples through Postman, improving developer experience for API exploration and testing.
proposedFix: Publish an official Postman collection containing all Temporal gRPC APIs with proper documentation.
keyQuote: Temporal should publish their collection with GRPC APIs documented. It will be epic.
